00010 classdef Sensor_2D < Sensor
00011 
00012    properties (SetAccess='public')
00013        %> sensor permittivity distribution (discretization grid object)
00014        discretization_grid;
00015        %> sensor boundary condition (discretization grid object)
00016        discretization_grid_voltage;
00017        %> vector of single sensor elements

00019        %> number of single sensor elements

00023    methods (Access=public)
00024        % ==================================================================
00025        %> @brief Constructor.
00026        %>
00027        %> @param varargin{1} Discretization_grid_2D_square object.      
00028        %>
00029        %> @return instance of the Sensor_2D class.
00030        % ==================================================================
00031        function s_obj=Sensor_2D(varargin)
00032            if nargin == 0 ; % no input arguments
00033            elseif isa(varargin{1},'Sensor_2D')
00034             s_obj = varargin{1}; % copy constructor
00035             display 'copy constructor Sensor_2D'
00036             return; 
00037            else
00038                switch(nargin)
00039                    case 1,
00040                        if(isa(varargin{1},'Discretization_grid_2D_square'))
00041                             dg_tmp=varargin{1};
00042                             s_obj.discretization_grid=Discretization_grid_2D_square(dg_tmp.matrix_size_mm,dg_tmp.grid_size_mm);
00043                             s_obj.discretization_grid_voltage=Discretization_grid_2D_square(dg_tmp.matrix_size_mm,dg_tmp.grid_size_mm);
00044                                                         
00045                             s_obj.number_of_sensor_elements=1;  
00046                             s_obj.vector_sensor_elements=repmat(Sensor_element_circular,1,1);
00047                                                         
00048                        else
00049                            display 'This is not Discretization Grid';
00050                        end
00051                    
00052                    otherwise
00053                        error('too less or too many input arguments');
00054                end
00055            end
00056        end
00057        
00058        % ==================================================================
00059        %> @brief Add single element to sensor. Update permittivty and
00060        %> boundary conditions grids.
00061        %>
00062        %> @param sensor_element Object of Sensor_element class.        
00063        % ==================================================================
00064        function add_element(sensor,sensor_element)      
00065            
00066            if(isa(sensor_element,'Sensor_element'))
00067                length_input_elements=length(sensor_element);
00068                % You can add one sensor_element or vector of sensor_elements
00069                    for j=1:length_input_elements
00070                  
00071                        sensor.vector_sensor_elements(sensor.number_of_sensor_elements)=sensor_element(j);                     
00072                        
00073                        
00074                        % Permittivity section
00075                        % find indicies were value is nozero -> less indicies to check
00076                       
00077                        vector_of_indecies=sensor_element(j).point_list;
00078                        length_of_indices_vector=length(vector_of_indecies);
00079                        for i=1:length_of_indices_vector
00080                            
00081                             sensor_element_value=sensor_element(j).discretization_grid_of_element.value_list(vector_of_indecies(i));
00082                             % 1)blank discretization grid has value '1' in each point
00083                             % 2)order of the elements is important, last element is on top
00084                             if(sensor_element_value~=1)
00085                                 sensor.discretization_grid.value_list(vector_of_indecies(i))=sensor_element(j).discretization_grid_of_element.value_list(vector_of_indecies(i));
00086                             end      
00087                                                    
00088                        end       
00089                        
00090 
00091                        % Voltage section
00092                        if(~strcmp(sensor_element(j).voltage,'none'))
00093                            sensor_element_value_tmp=sensor_element(j).discretization_grid_of_voltage.value_list-1;
00094                            % find indicies were value is nozero -> less indicies to check
00095                         
00096                            vector_of_indecies=sensor_element(j).point_list;
00097                            length_of_indices_vector=length(vector_of_indecies);
00098                            for i=1:length_of_indices_vector
00099                                
00100                                 sensor_element_value=sensor_element(j).discretization_grid_of_voltage.value_list(vector_of_indecies(i));
00101                                 % 1)blank discretization grid has value '1' in each point
00102                                 % 2)order of the elements is important, last element is on top
00103                                 if(sensor_element_value~=1)
00104                                     sensor.discretization_grid_voltage.value_list(vector_of_indecies(i))=sensor_element(j).discretization_grid_of_voltage.value_list(vector_of_indecies(i));
00105                                 end
00106                            end
00107                        end
00108                        
00109                        for i=1:length_of_indices_vector
00110                         ln_sens_vc=sensor.number_of_sensor_elements;
00111                         % to update/cover values must be more then one
00112                         % sensor element
00113                         if(ln_sens_vc>1)
00114                         for m=1:(ln_sens_vc-1)
00115                              sensor_element=sensor.vector_sensor_elements(m);
00116                              sensor_element.discretization_grid_of_element.value_list(vector_of_indecies(i))=1;
00117                              ind_tmp=find(sensor_element.point_list==vector_of_indecies(i));
00118                              sensor_element.point_list(ind_tmp)=[];
00119                         end
00120                         end
00121                       end
00122                             
00123                        sensor.number_of_sensor_elements=sensor.number_of_sensor_elements+1;
00124                        
00125                    end
00126            else
00127                 display 'You are trying add object that is not a sensor element';
00128            end          
00129        end
00130        
00131        % ==================================================================
00132        %> @brief Draw geometrical representation of sensor. First create new
00133        %> figure.       
00134        % ==================================================================
00135        function sketch(sensor)
00136            hold on;
00137            for i=1:sensor.number_of_sensor_elements-1               
00138                sensor.vector_sensor_elements(i).drawing;
00139            end
00140            hold off;
00141        end
00142              
00143        % ==================================================================
00144        %> @brief Draw  permittivity representation of sensor in grid. Two modes  
00145        %> available auto or thresholds.
00146        %>
00147        %> @param varargin{1} mode - auto or threshold
00148        %> @param varargin{2} value of lower threshold (if threshold mode enable else without this field)
00149        %> @param varargin{3} value of upper threshold (if threshold mode enable else without this field)       
00150        % ==================================================================
00151        function draw_permittivity(varargin)                      
00152            
00153            % default - auto
00154            if nargin==1
00155                s_obj=varargin{1};
00156                s_obj.discretization_grid.set_display_thresholds('auto');
00157                s_obj.discretization_grid
00158                                               
00159            % thresholds
00160            elseif nargin==4
00161                 s_obj=varargin{1};
00162                 mode=varargin{2};
00163                 lt_tmp=varargin{3};
00164                 ut_tmp=varargin{4};
00165                 
00166                 if (strcmp(mode,'thresholds'))                    
00167                     s_obj.discretization_grid.set_display_thresholds('thresholds',lt_tmp,ut_tmp);
00168                     s_obj.discretization_grid
00169                 else
00170                     error 'Incorrect threshold mode'
00171                 end                                
00172                 
00173            else
00174                error 'Incorrect number of input elements'
00175            end                      
00176            
00177        end % draw_permittivity
00178            
00179    end
00180 end
